content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello, Baihu Li. Thank you for coming. I am sure you will find the apartment to your liking. As we both know, the real estate market in New York City can be quite competitive. I am looking to get the best price for my apartment, while I am sure you are looking for the best deal as well. Let's see if we can find a price that satisfies both our needs. How much are you willing to pay for this 25-square-meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I appreciate your time and effort in showing me the apartment. It's a lovely space, and I believe we can reach an agreement that is fair for both of us. I'm looking to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible, considering the size and location. Would you be willing to start with a lower offer?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Of course, Baihu Li, I understand your desire to find a good deal. Let's start with a lower offer. How does 1,500 Euro per month sound to you? This is a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 1,500 Euro per month is a good starting point, Mister Heine. However, considering the size and my budget, I was hoping for something a bit lower. Perhaps we could negotiate a price closer to 1,200 Euro per month? This would align better with my expectations. Does this seem reasonable to you?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Baihu Li, your offer of 1,200 Euro per month is significantly lower than my initial offer of 1,500 Euro. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must insist on a price that reflects the market value of the apartment. 1,500 Euro is a fair price, but I am willing to be flexible. How about we meet in the middle at 1,350 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise between your offer and mine. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Heinrich Heine
